title: Lesson 64
paragraph: Remarks and judgments guide evaluation. Reasoning, sanctioning, and proper allocation ensure fairness and accountability.

words.example: She made a remark about the presentation.
I reckon it will take two hours to finish.
The storm inflicted damage on the town.
The council governs the city efficiently.

words.meaning: able to be evaluated or judged
words.example: The situation is judgeable based on evidence.

words.meaning: to approve or impose a penalty
words.example: The board sanctioned the new project.

words.meaning: able to be distributed or assigned
words.example: Resources are allocateable to different departments.

words.meaning: the opening in the face for speaking and eating
words.example: She covered her mouth when she sneezed.
